metadata.title: CVE-2021-28940 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Because of a incorrect escaped exec command in MagpieRSS in 0.72 in the/extlib/Snoopy.class.inc file, it is possible to add a extra command to thecurl binary. This creates an issue on the /scripts/magpie_debug.php and/scripts/magpie_simple.php page that if you send a specific https url inthe RSS URL field, you are able to execute arbitrary commands.

criterions.comment: magpierss: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
